faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating custom venue mystery cases.

q1.question: How do I get started with a custom venue case?
q1.answer: Simply sign up for our 7-day free trial. You'll provide details about your venue, and our team will create a custom mystery case tailored to your specific location and guest experience goals.

q2.question: What information do you need about my venue?
q2.answer: We'll need basic details like your venue type, layout, unique features, target guest demographics, and any special characteristics that make your property unique. This helps us craft the perfect mystery experience.

q3.question: How long does it take to create my custom case?
q3.answer: Your exclusive custom case is generated and delivered within 24 hours after you complete your venue registration. We use advanced AI to create a unique mystery tailored to your specific property.

q1.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or fees. Your case will remain active until the end of your current billing period.

q2.question: What happens during the 7-day free trial?
q2.answer: During your free trial, you'll get full access to our platform, custom case creation, and all features. You can cancel before the trial ends to avoid charges.

q3.question: Do you offer refunds?
q3.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with your custom case. We're confident you'll love the results, but your satisfaction is our priority.

q1.question: What kind of analytics do you provide?
q1.answer: You'll get detailed insights including guest engagement rates, completion statistics, average play time, guest feedback scores, and seasonal performance trends to help optimize your guest experience.

q2.question: How do I track guest participation?
q2.answer: Our platform provides real-time tracking of guest interactions, including who's playing, how far they've progressed, and their satisfaction ratings. Perfect for understanding your ROI.

q3.question: Can I see guest reviews and feedback?
q3.answer: Yes, you'll have access to anonymous guest feedback and ratings through your dashboard, helping you understand what guests love most about their mystery experience.

q1.question: What support do you offer?
q1.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support via email and chat. Our team helps with setup, troubleshooting, case updates, and any questions about maximizing your guest experience.

q2.question: How do guests access the mystery case?
q2.answer: Guests simply scan a unique QR code you'll display in your venue. This gives them instant access to their mystery adventure on any smartphone or tablet - no app downloads required.

q3.question: Can you update or modify my case over time?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We can create seasonal variants, update storylines, or modify cases based on guest feedback. This keeps the experience fresh for repeat visitors.

testimonials.title: What Venue Owners Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of successful venue owners who've transformed their guest experience.

sarah.name: James Anderson
sarah.text: The mystery experience has become the talking point of our cottage. Guests arrive curious and leave as amateur detectives! We've seen a remarkable uptick in repeat bookings, particularly from corporate groups seeking unique team-building experiences. Quite marvellous really.

marcus.name: Emily Parker
marcus.text: What started as an experiment has transformed how guests experience our retreat. The Scottish folklore elements woven into the mystery are absolutely spot-on. We've had guests book exclusively during off-season just for the exclusive mystery content. Revenue up 35% year-over-year!

elena.name: Oliver Bennett
elena.text: Running a coastal property means competing with countless others, but this mystery case gives us a genuine edge. Families love solving clues along the coastal path, and we've partnered with local businesses who feature in the storyline. It's brilliant for the whole community!
